thread.title: BRIEF-TechnipFMC Reports Qtrly Loss Per Share $0.33

title: BRIEF-TechnipFMC Reports Qtrly Loss Per Share $0.33
text:
Feb 21 (Reuters) - Technipfmc Plc:
* TECHNIPFMC ANNOUNCES FOURTH QUARTER 2017 RESULTS * QTRLY LOSS PER SHARE $0.33 * QTRLY ‍REVENUE $3,683.0 MILLION​ * QUARTER-END ‍BACKLOG $12,982.8 MILLION​
* “‍IN 2018, WE EXPECT TO SEE ANOTHER INCREASE IN SUBSEA MARKET ACTIVITY”​
* ‍RECORDED A TAX PROVISION DURING Q4 OF $295.8 MILLION​ * SEES 2018 ONSHORE/OFFSHORE REVENUE IN A RANGE OF $5.3 BILLION – 5.7 BILLION
* SEES ‍2018 SUBSEA REVENUE IN A RANGE OF $5.0 BILLION- 5.3 BILLION​
* SEES ‍2018 SURFACE TECHNOLOGIES REVENUE IN A RANGE OF $1.5 BILLION - 1.6 BILLION​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
